meanings.sent1: I always double-check my baggages before a trip to make sure I have everything I need.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to lift her heavy baggages onto the luggage rack.
meanings.sent3: Carrying all my baggages through the airport felt like a workout!
meanings.sent4: Her baggages were like a treasure chest full of memories from her adventures.
meanings.sent5: The colorful baggages stood out on the conveyor belt, making them easy to spot.

meanings.sent1: Letting go of past baggages can help you feel lighter and happier.
meanings.sent2: He carried the weight of his emotional baggages for years before seeking help.
meanings.sent3: Talking to a therapist can help you unpack your emotional baggages.
meanings.sent4: Her baggages of guilt and regret weighed heavily on her heart.
meanings.sent5: Addressing your emotional baggages is an important step towards healing and growth.

meanings.sent1: It's time to declutter and get rid of all these baggages cluttering up the attic.

meanings.sent4: The baggages of old furniture were taking up too much space in the house.
